title: Freshco
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Organic vegetarian place offers salads, juices, empanadas and desserts on the grab. Lots of choices like the nomu burger (grilled portobello) can be made vegan without the cheese. Artesanal breads and a little market with organic products. Also offers a detox program with organic juices and soups and is prepared according to requirements of the client.
